## ApiNamespaceAria2.saveSession() method

This method saves the current session to a file specified by the `--save-session` option. This method returns `OK` if it succeeds.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
saveSession(): Promise<'OK'>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;'OK'&gt;

string 'OK'
